headline.main: Germany Says EU Must Check if Turkey Funds Achieving Intended Aims
headline.print_headline: Germany Says EU Must Check if Turkey Funds Achieving Intended Aims

lead_paragraph: Berlin on Monday rejected as "absurd" Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan's comparison of current German policies to the Nazi era, and said the European Union should check if funds aimed at preparing Turkey to enter the bloc were working as intended.
snippet: Berlin on Monday rejected as "absurd" Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan's comparison of current German policies to the Nazi era, and said the European Union should check if funds aimed at preparing Turkey to enter the bloc were working as intended....
